price: 153. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyoow! Kaalmaysta samirka iyo salaadda. Hubaal! Alle wuxuu la jiraa kuwa samirka badan.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū is'taʿīnū bil-ṣabri wal-ṣalati inna al-laha maʿa al-ṣābirīna
